title: Help me take off this low priority queue?
body: So i was playing a normal game with a friend when my connection cut out 5 minutes into a game, but the connection came back about 10 minutes later and the game went on and we eventually won, but after the game it said because of leaving and AFKing games ive been put in low priority queues for 5 games, 20 minute timers each. I'm wondering if there's any way to get this off my account? I'm not sure if i got reported because of it but i find it kind of unfair.

replies.body:
When a player disconnects from a match, it will negatively impact all players in the match, even if the disconnection was not intentional. This is one of the reasons why the Leaverbuster system treats all leaves equally and why penalties cannot be modified. The only way to work off the queue timers is to play games consistently without disconnecting. You can find more information on how the Leaverbuster system works [in our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

If you still need assistance with your connection, give me a few more details on the specific symptoms you saw and I'll gladly help you troubleshoot them.
Oh thank you for the reply, and yea i guess ill just work off the 20 minute timers.
